name: Roggenwolf
description: The Roggenwolf is a medium-sized monstrosity with excellent agility, featuring sharp senses and a muscular build. It displays a threatening demeanor with a potent howl that can instill fear in others.
memorable: Its ability to instill fear through its howl, combined with its agility and stealth, makes the Roggenwolf a memorable and dangerous opponent.
goals: To hunt and ambush prey, utilizing stealth and psychological tactics.
relations: Similar to wolves or other predatory creatures, it may hunt in packs or be found alongside other monstrous creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark forests or caves, where it can rely on its stealth and cunning to best its prey.
strengths: High Dexterity and stealth proficiency allow it to be an exceptional ambusher; resistance to nonmagical damage adds a tactical edge.
weaknesses: Weak against silvered weapons, making it vulnerable to certain forms of attack.
attacks: Bite attack dealing necrotic damage and a terrifying howl that frightens and restrains its foes.
most_powerful_ability: The Howl can frighten and restrain multiple targets, significantly hindering their actions.
senses: The creature has keen senses, especially in hearing and smell, granting it advantage on Perception checks relying on these senses.
skills: Proficient in stealth, allowing it to approach unsuspecting prey effectively.
additional_information: Possesses resistance to nonmagical weapon damage unless made with silver.
Has a strong physical presence with notable good Strength.
Very low Intelligence indicating primal instincts.
Keen Hearing and Smell special ability enhances its tracking capabilities.
Agile predator with a knack for ambush tactics.

agile monster that uses fear in combat
medium creature known for ambush and stealth
